si.title: ගෘහස්ථ රයිෆල සමඟ අත්අඩංගුවට
body_lines: ගිරියුල්ලා පොලිසියට ලැබුණු රහස්ය තොරතුරු පදනම් කරගෙන සැකකරු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ.

en.title: Arrested with domestic rifle
body_lines: A suspect with domestic gun in Elagamillava area belonging to the Kiruulla police division in Kurunegala has been arrested yesterday (22), Kirulla police said.
The suspect has been arrested on the basis of confidential information received by the Girulla police.

summary_lines: Domestic rifle arrest: Suspect caught in Elagamillava, Kurunegala. Police acted on confidential tip.
